header.title: Outsourcing — selection criterias
header.subtitle: A precise description of the criteria used for selecting vendors
header.version: Revised version after the board meeting

document.body:
Introduction
This document is written in conformance with the guidelines from the Norwegian ministry of trade and industry (Nærings- og handelsdepartementet, NHD) (see «Veileder», link on the overview page).
The purpose of the selection criteria is to select the economically most appealling offer. The main criterion is price, but also indirect costs and longer term costs will influence the decision.
The selection criteria as well as the weighting have been approved by the project board.
Selection criteria
The selected offer is the economically most attractive one. That implies an evaluation of price and the following criteria:
Technical compatibility with our existing linguistic resources and language technology.
Willingness to license tools to compile the binary lexicon for the proofing tools to Sámediggi and the project group, such that linguistic, non-technical updates can be delivered to end users without involvement from the cooperating companies).
The total cost in a longer perspective. This includes the price for this project, and the costs for maintenance updates, combined with the costs for the Sámi Parliament for the same maintenance.
Quality, functionality and user friendliness. Quality and user evaluation of corresponding tools for other languages. In the case of the InDesign hyphenator, it is essential that a company can provide a documented capability to develop high-quality hyphenation modules, benefitting from our linguistic work and tools. In the case of proofing tools for MS Office, it is important that the estimated quality of the end user products is high enough for our end users, to reduce the risk of extra work and higher costs later on in the project.
The exact documentation needed to support a decision based on these criteria is specified in the main public tender document.
The final word
The winning company is the one that, after a total evaluation of price and quality criteria, gives the best offer. Price will be important. The decision is made by the project board.
